item.title: Scientists find a 35,000-year-old saber-toothed kitten in the Siberian permafrost
item.description: The kitten, which was found in Russia's northeastern Sakha Republic, still had fur and whiskers when it was discovered.

item.title: Biden and Xi take a first step to limit AI and nuclear decisions at their last meeting
item.description: The leaders agreed that humans should control decisions to use nuclear weapons — not AI. And they talked about the importance of stability during the ...

item.title: Trump announces oil executive Chris Wright as his pick for energy secretary
item.description: Trump announced Chris Wright, the CEO of oil and natural gas fracking services company Liberty Energy, as his pick for energy secretary.

item.title: A derogatory term for Native women will be removed from place names across California
